meanings.definition: The act of dividing an area into regions.
meanings.sent1: The regionalizations of the country helped people understand different parts better.
meanings.sent2: Urban planning involves the regionalizations of cities to improve living conditions.
meanings.sent3: The regionalizations of the school cafeteria made lunchtime more interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her regionalizations of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The regionalizations of the map made it easier to navigate unfamiliar territories.

meanings.definition: The process of making something specific to a particular region.
meanings.sent1: Cultural regionalizations showcase the unique traditions of each area.
meanings.sent2: The regionalizations of the menu catered to the local taste preferences.
meanings.sent3: His regionalizations of the office decor added a touch of personality to the workspace.
meanings.sent4: The regionalizations of the music festival highlighted diverse regional talents.
meanings.sent5: The regionalizations of the product packaging targeted different regional markets effectively.
